title: Realm Glyphs (Part 2)
body:
Realm Glyphs (Part 2)

"How is she?" Ron asked, looking at Margaret who was lying unconscious on the ground.

"She is alive, but her core and life force have been seriously damaged and it will take a long time for her to fully recover" Nathan said and sighed loudly.

He looked at Ron and his expression turned cold. "You already knew those monsters weren't normal, but you still decided to follow that f*cking plan. Were you out of your mind?"

"I_" Ron lowered his head in shame because he had no excuse to tell Nathan.

After dealing with Ronan, Evan called back the Titan Elephant who was fighting against Ron. After the Titan Elephant backed away, Ron also returned back to see the situation of the hunters.

But when he came back and saw the huge crater that was filled with the meat paste and blood mist of hunters, his mentality nearly collapsed due to regret.
